collection_page.p: The STEP Module and Resource Library (SMRL) includes the following documents:

ul.li: modular &tr-application-protocols;: members of the &tr-application-protocol; series of parts (ISO 10303 parts 201 to 299) that conform to the modular architecture;
&tr-application-module; series of parts: ISO 10303 parts 401 to 499 and 1001 to 1999;
&tr-application-interpreted-construct; series of parts: ISO 10303 parts 501 to 599;
&tr-integrated-resource; series of parts: ISO 10303 parts 41 to 199;

collection_page.p: Additional documents may be added to the SMRL through a vote of ISO TC 184/SC 4.
Each part of ISO 10303 belonging to the SMRL is maintained as a separate ISO document. However, the SMRL shall be distributed as a collection.
